Summary Working cross several mulitnational corporations has given me a unique perspective of product and project management across engineering, operations, finance and strategy. 
 
I am an action oriented person who excels at discerning action in ambiguity and delivering. I am also passionate, optimistic, and creative. I come up with innovative approaches, but what makes me unique is I actually act on them. Through the breath of my work experience, I’ve learned technology and business and can intuit the threats and opportunities on the horizon. I am an out of the box thinker, but also value process execution and happily stay in the box if it's working. In I thrive in an environment of change; pushing businesses to adapt and respond in light of rapidly changing business and technology environment. I lean into the change to engage and advise with authenticity and transparency; expecting the same of my organizations.

Summary Accomplished product and development manager with repeated high performance results and broad technical and business experience, focused on consumer electronics and medical products. A proven product leader that has managed multi-million dollar programs to delivery, in marketing, program management and technical roles. Holistic business focus, with a sharp ability to tackle complex problems, identify core issues, and establish solutions. Recognized for an ability to pull teams together, influence at many levels, and deliver.  
 
Core Competencies
